name: ffmpeg

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: gpl
variants.description: allow use of GPL code, the resulting libs and binaries will be under GPL

variants.name: nonfree
variants.description: allow use of nonfree code, the resulting libs and binaries will be unredistributable

variants.name: libsnappy
variants.description: Snappy compression, needed for hap encoding

variants.name: libxml2
variants.description: XML parsing, needed for dash demuxing support

description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: alsa-lib
dependencies.description:
The Advanced Linux Sound Architecture (ALSA) provides audio and MIDI
functionality to the Linux operating system. alsa-lib contains the user
space library that developers compile ALSA applications against.

dependencies.name: libiconv
dependencies.description:
GNU libiconv provides an implementation of the iconv() function and the
iconv program for character set conversion.

dependencies.name: yasm
dependencies.description:
Yasm is a complete rewrite of the NASM-2.11.06 assembler. It supports
the x86 and AMD64 instruction sets, accepts NASM and GAS assembler
syntaxes and outputs binary, ELF32 and ELF64 object formats.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: aom
dependencies.description: Alliance for Open Media AOM AV1 Codec Library

dependencies.name: bzip2
dependencies.description:
bzip2 is a freely available, patent free high-quality data compressor.
It typically compresses files to within 10% to 15% of the best available
techniques (the PPM family of statistical compressors), whilst being
around twice as fast at compression and six times faster at
decompression.

dependencies.name: fontconfig
dependencies.description: Fontconfig is a library for configuring/customizing font access

dependencies.name: freetype
dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependencies.name: fribidi
dependencies.description:
GNU FriBidi: The Free Implementation of the Unicode Bidirectional
Algorithm.

dependencies.name: lame
dependencies.description:
LAME is a high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder licensed under
the LGPL.

dependencies.name: libssh
dependencies.description: libssh: the SSH library

dependencies.name: libvorbis
dependencies.description:
Ogg Vorbis is a fully open, non-proprietary, patent-and-royalty-free,
general-purpose compressed audio format for mid to high quality (8kHz-
48.0kHz, 16+ bit, polyphonic) audio and music at fixed and variable
bitrates from 16 to 128 kbps/channel.

dependencies.name: libvpx
dependencies.description:
libvpx is a free software video codec library from Google and the
Alliance for Open Media. It serves as the reference software
implementation for the VP8 and VP9 video coding formats, and for AV1 a
special fork named libaom that was stripped of backwards compatibility.

dependencies.name: libwebp
dependencies.description:
WebP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy
compression for images on the web. Using WebP, webmasters and web
developers can create smaller, richer images that make the web faster.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: libxv
dependencies.description: libXv - library for the X Video (Xv) extension to the X Window System.

dependencies.name: libzmq
dependencies.description: The ZMQ networking/concurrency library and core API

dependencies.name: openjpeg
dependencies.description:
OpenJPEG is an open-source JPEG 2000 codec written in C language. It has
been developed in order to promote the use of JPEG 2000, a still-image
compression standard from the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG).
Since April 2015, it is officially recognized by ISO/IEC and ITU-T as a
JPEG 2000 Reference Software.

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.

dependencies.name: opus
dependencies.description: Opus is a totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.

dependencies.name: sdl2
dependencies.description:
Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform development library
designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse,
joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D.

dependencies.name: snappy
dependencies.description: A fast compressor/decompressor: https://code.google.com/p/snappy

dependencies.name: speex
dependencies.description:
Speex is an Open Source/Free Software patent-free audio compression
format designed for speech.

dependencies.name: xz
dependencies.description:
XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with high
compression ratio. XZ Utils were written for POSIX-like systems, but
also work on some not-so-POSIX systems. XZ Utils are the successor to
LZMA Utils.

dependencies.name: x264
dependencies.description: Software library and application for encoding video streams

dependent_to.name: r-animation
dependent_to.description:
A Gallery of Animations in Statistics and Utilities to Create
Animations. Provides functions for animations in statistics, covering
topics in probability theory, mathematical statistics, multivariate
statistics, non-parametric statistics, sampling survey, linear models,
time series, computational statistics, data mining and machine learning.
These functions maybe helpful in teaching statistics and data analysis.

dependent_to.name: opencv
dependent_to.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependent_to.name: openimageio
dependent_to.description:
OpenImageIO is a library for reading and writing images, and a bunch of
related classes, utilities, and applications.

dependent_to.name: py-imageio-ffmpeg
dependent_to.description:
The purpose of this project is to provide a simple and reliable ffmpeg
wrapper for working with video files. It implements two simple generator
functions for reading and writing data from/to ffmpeg, which reliably
terminate the ffmpeg process when done. It also takes care of publishing
platform-specific wheels that include the binary ffmpeg executables.

dependent_to.name: vtk
dependent_to.description:
The Visualization Toolkit (VTK) is an open-source, freely available
software system for 3D computer graphics, image processing and
visualization.

dependent_to.name: py-imageio
dependent_to.description:
Python library for reading and writing image data. Imageio is a Python
library that provides an easy interface to read and write a wide range
of image data, including animated images, video, volumetric data, and
scientific formats. It is cross-platform, runs on Python 2.7 and 3.4+,
and is easy to install.

dependent_to.name: mivisionx
dependent_to.description:
MIVisionX toolkit is a set of comprehensive computer vision and machine
intelligence libraries, utilities, and applications bundled into a
single toolkit.

dependent_to.name: lammps
dependent_to.description:
LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel
Simulator. This package uses patch releases, not stable release. See
https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/5342 for a detailed discussion.

dependent_to.name: py-torchvision
dependent_to.description:
The torchvision package consists of popular datasets, model
architectures, and common image transformations for computer vision.

dependent_to.name: gmt
dependent_to.description:
GMT (Generic Mapping Tools) is an open source collection of about 80
command-line tools for manipulating geographic and Cartesian data sets
(including filtering, trend fitting, gridding, projecting, etc.) and
producing PostScript illustrations ranging from simple x-y plots via
contour maps to artificially illuminated surfaces and 3D perspective
views.

dependent_to.name: py-youtube-dl
dependent_to.description:
Command-line program to download videos from YouTube.com and other video
sites.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: openscenegraph
dependent_to.description:
OpenSceneGraph is an open source, high performance 3D graphics toolkit
that's used in a variety of visual simulation applications.

dependent_to.name: sumo
dependent_to.description:
Eclipse SUMO is an open source, highly portable, microscopic and
continuous road traffic simulation package designed to handle large road
networks. It allows for intermodal simulation including pedestrians and
comes with a large set of tools for scenario creation.
